routes.name: Capacity by Region
routes.description:
Densified biomass capacity includes number of facilities 
        and number of employees.  Source: EIA-63C  Report:  www.eia.gov/biomass/

routes.name: Sales and Price by Region
routes.description:
Densified biomass sales and average price by region.  
        Source: EIA-63C  Report:  www.eia.gov/biomass/

routes.name: Export Sales and Price
routes.description:
Densified biomass export prices and quantity.  
        Source: EIA-63C  Report:  www.eia.gov/biomass/

routes.name: Feedstocks and Costs
routes.description:
Densified biomass feedstocks and cost by type.  
        Source: EIA-63C  Report:  www.eia.gov/biomass/

routes.name: Production by Region
routes.description:
Densified biomass production by region and fuel type.  
        Source: EIA-63C  Report:  www.eia.gov/biomass/

routes.name: Characteristics by Region
routes.description:
Densified biomass characteristics includes 
        fuel type, average ash, heat, and moisture content by region. 
        Source: EIA-63C  Report:  www.eia.gov/biomass/

routes.name: Inventories by Region
routes.description:
Densified biomass inventories by region and fuel type.  
        Source: EIA-63C  Report:  www.eia.gov/biomass/

routes.name: Wood Pellet Plant Capacity
routes.description:
Details on wood pellet plants includes region, respondent, 
    capacity, and status.  Source: EIA-63C  Report:  www.eia.gov/biomass/
